translations: n.庞然大物；巨型喷气式客机（jumbo 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Qantas grounded its fleet of six super-jumbos.
sentences.translation: 澳航停飞了其所有6架空客A380客机编队。

sentences.sentence: Qantas grounded its fleet of six super-jumbos. Other airlines pulled theirs in for rapid inspections.
sentences.translation: 澳洲航空停用了它的6架该类型的客机，其他航空公司则对他们的该型号客机进行了快速检查。

sentences.sentence: In 2009 it announced that it would build a new factory to assemble 787 Dreamliner jumbos in South Carolina.
sentences.translation: 2009年时波音公司宣布要在南卡罗来纳州建设一家波音787“梦幻客机”组装工厂。
